title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 201.1 - Prior approval of commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 201.1 - Prior approval of commissioner

State Regulations

No public or private agency shall establish or carry on
experimental pilot clinic programs for the treatment of drug addiction which
includes the administration of maintenance dosages of addicting drugs except
with the prior approval of the Commissioner of Mental Hygiene and subject to
his review and in conjunction with related experimental pilot clinic programs
established by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
201.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
